## Cluster Requirements

Does this plugin require additional cluster resources? Check all that apply:

- [ ] Operator installation
- [ ] Custom resources (CRDs)
- [ ] External services
- [ ] Service accounts / RBAC
- [ ] Secrets / credentials
- [ ] None - frontend only plugin
